nodes.text: Always plenty of rooms here for our friends. Only going to cost you $20 for eight hours of safe and comfortable shut-eye. A whole room to yourself. Have a party.
You don’t seem to be too popular in this part of town. Well, maybe the jury’s still out on you. How can I help you?
I’d like to make you one of my special friends, sweetheart. (grins) It’s not easy to get this stuff from the Den. Tell you what -— I’ll give you a special price on what I’ve got.
I’ve got all kinds of things right here, kid: healing supplies, booze, all kinds of stuff. I've got special sources, ya' might say. Always willing to look at a good gecko pelt, too.

Well, Smiley was one of the best trappers there ever was. He up and left Mrs. Buckner one day, and said he was going to find where all the golden geckos come from. Said he’d be rich if he could find it. But he hasn’t come back -- and that was a while back, too.
Well, they say critters that look like man-sized bugs walking around on two legs are tearing open brahmin in the middle of the night. Only Torr’s caught a good look at them though. Scary,  huh?

Well, the Dunton brothers are always looking for someone to do their dirty work for them. And for that matter, Torr, the Buckner boy, is scared to go tend the brahmin at night on account of the  bugmen.
Yeah? What the heck do you want to know about?
Well, let’s just say that I have connections with some important people south of here -- in the  Den.
Garden of Eden, huh? Well, Jenny’s the closest I’ve been to the Garden of Eden. Only a few dollars to create that. (smiles) Sounds nice, but I don’t know where you’d find it.
We don’t have any rooms here, pal. Sorry, full up.
Not too many traders in town. Just Vic, that I can think of. He’s got a house in the east part of town. He used to trade prewar stuff at the Den and to tribals. Haven’t seen him for a bit,  though.
I don’t know what you’re talking about, pal. Do you want to trade or not?
A round of piss for the whole bar then! Huzzah! That’ll be $30. (Big smile)
Hello there, stranger. Welcome to the Golden Gecko Tavern, Hotel, and Trading Post. I’m Sajag; I run the place. What can I get for you?

There are a couple of settlements nearby. There are some tribals northwest of us -— but I ‘spose you know about them. (smiles) Then there’s the Den a few days south of here -- that’s the closest -- and there’s a mining town called Redding quite a ways to the southWest.

Well, west of town there’s a canyon. A few months back there was a bright light coming from there and then critters started disappearing. Tracks lead into the canyon, but none lead out. Spooky, huh? Some have heard a weird whining sound echoing off the canyon walls there, too.
Hey there, friend. A little bird told me that you know where old Whiskey Bob has his still. I sure would like to know where that is.
Forget I mentioned it then. Not a big thing. (smiles)
Well, if it’s not another dang idiot. Just like Torr. Get the hell out of my bar.
It’s just beer. Golden Gecko, Gecko Piss? Are you slow or what? (shakes his head) Tribals, sheesh.

Well, let’s see. All sorts of things going on in town lately. (counts on his fingers) There’s brahmin-mutilating bugmen, rodents of unusual size, a walking spirit, and a missing hunter. Klamath’s become a real hot spot lately.
One tall mug of Golden Gecko Piss coming up. Only $5 for the best beer north of Redding.
Thanks for the information, friend. I’ll make sure it’s put to good use. (smiles) Here’s your $50 and a piss on the house, too. Anything else I can help you with?

Some say that there’s a gigantic rat, the size of a Corvega, that rules over all the rats over in Trapper Town (west of downtown). They say that it lives in an old mine underneath Trapper Town and that all the other rats bring it any shiny objects that they find. (licks his lips) Mmm, Shiny baubles.

links.text: $20 sounds like a fair price to me. I’ll take it.
I don’t think I’ll take you up on that offer just now, Sajag. What about something else?
I’d like to trade.
I need some beer.
I would like to buy a round of drinks for everyone in the bar.
I’d like a room for the night.
Thanks for your help. Goodbye.
Let me see what you’ve got.
I guess I don’t need anything right now. But I do have some questions.
Special sources? Then you should be able to give me a really good price.
That’s incredible. Tell me more local news.
That’s all I need to know for now.
That’s incredible. Tell me more local news.
That’s all I need to know for now.
That’s all I need for now. Goodbye.
Thanks; I have another question for you.
I guess that’s all I need to know. But I do need something else.
I guess, that’s enough info for now.
Where can I get healing supplies?
I’m looking for a job. Any leads?
Are there any other settlements nearby?
Are there any traders here in Klamath?
Anything unusual going on here in Klamath?
Well, I’ll keep that in mind. Thanks for the money.
That’s all I need to know for now.
Well, that’s not quite what I was looking for. Let me ask you something else.
Thanks; I have another question for you.
I guess that’s all I need to know. But I do need something else.
That’s all I need for now. Goodbye.
You’ve got connections to the Den. Come on - I know you can make me a better deal.
Yeah, sure I want to trade. Sorry for asking.
I guess I don’t want to trade with you after all.
Enjoy your piss, everyone. Goodbye.
Everyone in here is drinking lizard piss!?!
Hope everyone enjoys the beer. Sajag, I need some information.
I’ll have a drink.
Oh eh oh?
I’d like to buy a round of drinks for the whole bar, to introduce myself.
I’d like a room for the night.
I’d like to trade.
I guess that’s all I need to know. But I do need something else.
That’s all I need for now. Goodbye.
Thanks; I have another question for you.
That’s incredible. Tell me more local news.
That’s all I need to know for now.
I might know that. What’s it worth to you?
Can’t stand a little competition, huh?
You’re mistaken. I’ve never met anyone named Whiskey.
I’m not drinking piss! I don’t care where it’s being served or what you call it!
I don’t want to know about anything else.
Tell me about the brahmin-mutilating bugmen, please.
Tell me about the walking spirit, please.
I’m not surprised that a hunter’s gone missing with all this excitement, but tell me about him,  too.
Tell me about the RUS's, please.
I’d like to ask about other things.
Thanks for the beer. I need some information though.
Thanks. That’s all I need for now. Goodbye.
You poured me a mug of piss!?!
That’s all I need for now. Goodbye.
I have some questions that I’d like to ask you.
I think I’d like to have a nice piss to celebrate.
How about a piss for all of my friends here?
That’s all I need to know for now.
That’s incredible. Tell me more local news.
